item.title: Memory Cats
item.description: Memory cats is a memory card game that sources its images from an API so that every game the player sees new cats. Memory Cats Title Try it in your browser! View the Source Code Memory Cats Screenshot Frontend Framework The frontend of the system uses the following technologies: Lit - Front end framework using the open web components standard. xstate - Provides declarative state machines for controlling application behaviour.
